measured_by: 7-point Likert self-report question: “how boring was the [task type] deck?”
justification: The article states: "…and 'how boring was the [task type] deck?'. Ratings were obtained on a 7-point Likert scale, with 1 indicating low … and 7 indicating the highest level of … boredom."
"We calculated accuracy on a per trial basis … on the Add-1 … tasks", where the Add-1 task requires adding 1 to each of four sequential digits, serving as the performance measure.

The paper describes the Add-3 task (adding 3 to each digit) and later notes "Average accuracy on the Add-3 task" was analysed, indicating this task’s accuracy was the instrument for measuring working-memory performance.
